website_summaries.verdict: A budget freestanding heavy bag with a focus on upper body exercises and workouts.
pros: The large plastic base can hold either sand or water for a stable foundation
Height is adjustable from 52 to 65 inches
The bag is smaller on top for a more focused workout for the upper body
cons: Hits and strikes will often leave marks on the bag's surface over time

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fill with water at all.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, says to use either water or sand for the weight, problem is the water leaks and spills everywhere. Sand is a better way to go, but I didn’t have an opportunity to get any and since it said water was fine I thought it would work well...they just need to do a better job sealing the attachments if they suggest water use.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect and was afraid the bag might have been a little flimsy but I have to tell you that I absolutely love it!!! My fiance and I cleaned out a little corner in the garage and this fits there so perfectly!!! It's perfect for my workouts and I don't have to pay Jabz $100+ per month any more. We put two 50 lb bags of sand in the bottom and left the sand right in the bags (way less messy that way). I do wish it was a little bit taller as even on the highest setting I can't do the high lateral punches but other than that one thing, I think it's pretty perfect!
customer_reviews.author: AZ PRO Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Its garbage
customer_reviews.text: Not good for adults. If you punch or kick it real hard the top piece flys off. The sand I put in it is coming from the bottom. This bag is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Reye808

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. I filled the base with sand
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I filled the base with sand. It takes a pretty good blow to get the bag to slide. You won't confuse this with a heavy bag. There is some motion at the top that you'll have to manage with your timing. But, for a garage bag and for the cost, this is a really excellent product. I assembled the thing myself in no time. The process was really easy. I do suggest putting the bag where you want it before you fill with sand. Once you've filled it with sand, it really wants to stay stationary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought it new, got a used one--water leaks out of the screws
customer_reviews.text: The bag is functional and can take some heavy kicks and punches. However, the screws on top of the bag's base will leak out water if you hit it at normal strength. This is frustrating because a small pool of water will collect on top of the bag's base and you know, eventually, you'll have to disassemble the whole thing and fill it back up again so it doesn't go flying when you hit it. In addition to these issues, I bought the bag "new" but it arrived used. I inferred this from the fact that it was covered in sand, as if the base had already been filled with sand previously. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Yosef

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Bought five sand bags and would recommend sand vs water. My brother is pretty tall, so it helps that we were able to adjust the height. The stand doesn't take too much room and my brother was able to set it up in the corner of his room.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: It took about 15 minutes to get everything set up and my entire family loves using it. If you need a freestanding punching bag with little to no effort setting it up, I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: Worst product to ever put together?
customer_reviews.text: By far the worst product I've ever had the pleasure of putting together. Not only did all of the holes not align on the base of the stand/bag, but I had to drill them larger just to make room for them because it was a "Santa" gift. On top of that, a whole set (bolt, washer, etc) were missing for the arm portion to be screwed into the base. What gives Everlast? I won't be buying your products anymore. How would I be able to explain to my kid, "Santa's going to have to return it to get one that actually passed the Elves Quality Assurance inspection." Really???
customer_reviews.author: Justin Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for free standing bag, great arm workout and for kicking too
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, sturdy and cushioned enough that withslum gloves I don’t wreck my buckles from full energy punches. Great for kicking and moves well.
customer_reviews.author: T Herdez

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Less than 30 minutes. I added water because I don't have access to sand to fill it. Even full, it doesn't feel like 250 lbs but the bag is sturdy. It only adjusted up to about 5'8" once you seat the top notch all the way in. But it may sit just fine and safe on a higher level. Remains to be seen. Solid bag but NOT stationary if you pack a punch or get in close. Just to work on footwork or just to "throw" punches, stay at a distance and maybe this baby won't keep sliding away as you punch it
customer_reviews.author: B. Love

customer_reviews.title: Longer than expected assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Fill with sand, leave in bags, can get 300 lbs in (not 370). Be prepared for longer than expected assembly time due to realigning holes with a drill or Dremel tool. Also, have your own metric Allen wrench set as the one they provide doesn’t fit in the screw properly and doesn’t have enough of a bite to actually tighten the bolts. Once assembled, the bag is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: shaster

customer_reviews.title: NOT PROPERLY BUILT
customer_reviews.text: Product was advertised as new, manufactured incorrectly, top plate missing one threaded hole as you can see from the photos what it's supposed to look like, but was incorrectly made...
customer_reviews.author: Darth Siddious

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son that practices Karate. He is 10 and loves it. He can adjust the height easily to accommodate all of his contact drills.
customer_reviews.author: Xrayaries

customer_reviews.title: Slides
customer_reviews.text: It definitely slides! Do yourself a favor and get some rug keeper or something tacky on the bottom before you put it together. The plastic base will slide on any surface. The best solution is to get some of the tacky carpet/rug anti-slide tape to put on the bottom. It will help reduce the sliding of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Clawbennett

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: It’s very disheartening to buy a product and you can’t assemble it because the holes don’t line up and there is so much glue over the holes. It’s disheartening to see the product begin to fall apart while taking it out of the package. Granted, I bought the product after it was returned but I can see why. I’m not trying to buy a product that’s extremely expensive and maybe “you get what you pay for” but I also didn’t spend $5 dollars. It’s pretty sad to buy a product with a name such as EVERLAST on it as well. I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany E.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice addition to our home gym fits in an area away from the bigger equipment. My husband assembled this and honestly and most important is to weigh it down to keep it from moving across the floor.. We used sand bags and bags of miniature pebbles all in all once stablized the item is a perfect addition to your daily workout the quality of the material is sturdy and tough I love that it is adjustable in height so my nephews can use it as well!
customer_reviews.author: msteecheesy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t budge. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriends bday. The only hard part (and funny part) was watching him fill the base with water. He doesn’t use it as much as I’d like him to. He is 5’9 180 and was heavily into boxing and what not. He can fully apply his total weight and the thing will not move. I can move the thing around to rearrange it by tilting and rolling. I am 118lbs 5’6.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great for our 12 year old
customer_reviews.text: Our 12 year old got this on Christmas day and he's absolutely in love. He's probably at the low end of average height and the lowest setting is perfect for him for both punching and kicking. Was easy to assemble and seems very sturdy. I think this is something he can use for as long into the future as he's still interested, unlike some other products we looked at that seemed like they may not last until the new year!
customer_reviews.author: Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: So easy a kid could do it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 14 year old daughter. With minimal help from Dad (he went to the hardware store to purchase sand to fill the base), she was able to set this up herself. Important to figure out where it’s gonna go because once it’s filled it’s quite heavy. If you own a dolly, though, it shouldn’t be an issue. The height is adjustable, which proved helpful. Overall we are pleased with the quality and ease of set up for this product. We were also pleased with delivery. Would definitely recommend to anyone who needs to make a nominal investment for home fitness.
customer_reviews.author: VoraciousReader

customer_reviews.title: Half-assed
customer_reviews.text: Simply to put together, or you would think. It's like crappy furniture you have to put together. The holes don't line up correctly when putting together so all the muscle you put into screwing it together is all for not. I got so fed up with it I took a damn drill bit and drilled my own holes. Also, the base leaks water or sand, so when it's time to refill it, it's hell all over again. When you finally put it together, it's fine, but all the tedious crap you have to go through overall is resulting in me having to throw this in the garbage and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap build
customer_reviews.text: The top part if the bag is cheaply glued together started falling apart after a month. I took it all apart and glued everything together and it works better but the foam eventually came apart from the center and slides up and down. I have own varius wave, bob and other bags. This is the worst. I but it at $100. New if i paid the current price i fould be livid.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great value food way to get frustrating out
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble the only down side is you need a lot of sand to fill it up and that can get messy. When you hit it even after its filled it still moves around so kicking and punching it super hard will cause alot of shaking in your house so I would recommend for a basement or garage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on sale and now it's on a bigger sale (less than $100). This is a great buy for kids to practice their mixed martial arts. My 8 year old uses it to practice on a regular basis. It fits in the corner of the room perfectly. My husband filled the bottom of the base with water to keep it weighted down. A couple kids from our martial arts class purchased this particular item. Great find! Especially on sale! Bigger kids/ Adults would need more water in the base and probably a mat underneath to prevent it from slipping on the floor from more powerful hits/kicks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great home-gym solution
customer_reviews.text: I had to discontinue use of mine per a degenerative issue with my elbow (20yo MTNbiking injury) but in the meantime has sooo much fun punching this thing around my hardwood-floor living room. I used 250lbs of sand, instead of water (concerned about flooding) in the foundation; it did scoot around a bit under the power of my onslaught ;D
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bartholme

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I put bags on concrete rocks instead of filling with sand or water in case I ever need to move it around. I put in 150lbs worth. It moves a little when punched, so I could fit another, but it doesn't move enough to make me want to go back to home depot, purchase another bag, and undo all the screws. Lol. Great bag for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Q.

customer_reviews.title: Use Sandbox Sand for weight
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Sturdy. Check out video on YouTube, it helps. I bought an Allen head bit so I could use my drill to tighten screws. Got Sandbox Sand from Lowe's - about $2.50 per 50lb. bag. Five or six bags will do the trick. I put a rubber mat under the bag stand so it wouldn't slip. Bought gel gloves. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Capra Man

customer_reviews.title: suck
customer_reviews.text: don't buy it. i Filled it with water , every time i training, water coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great stress reliever
customer_reviews.text: Considering that have to go buy a bunch of sand to put in the bottom of it I wish the price would have been just a bit cheaper. But I'm happy with my purchase. No, content with my purchase. I've been happier for the been a little less money since I have to go by so much saying. But definitely good for taking out my aggressions. It's a very well-made product. I would suggest it. Definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not a great option- loud and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a more quiet option than a traditional heavy bag, but this really falls short... horrible instructions, everything jammed into the package, and worst of all, its very loud and even filled to the brim with wet sand, a moderate strike sends it rocking back and fourth causing a loud wobbling sound. The height adjustment feature is very flimsy and the bag is just foam so when used for any amount of time it will get dented. Look- its very cheap for what it is, but dont expect a high quality alternative to a typical heavy bag.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: For what I got it for this bag works. I use it for more of cardio workout hitting the bag but for true frustration I use my heavy bag in the garage. However, avoid putting it on carpet and either use a rubber mat or even put it on concrete, it will slide on carpet very easily!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Good but no instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and strong but no instructions on putting together. Found a good video on you tube... thankfully! We decided to use sand, and glad we did. Take note, you need more if you do sand vs water. Read and research the details more. We didn’t realize it at first and had to redo.
customer_reviews.author: PD Mc

customer_reviews.title: Heavy hitters beware
customer_reviews.text: I weigh about 210lbs, and can tell you straight away that 250lbs of water is nowhere near enough weight (guessed that ahead of time but figured I would try) However, I think filled with sand it will hold up well enough. I did not notice any leaks as of yet, but the bolts were very hard to thread in straight, so I can see people having issues with leaking around the bolts because of this ... The bag feels good but I'm not sure that the foam rolls will hold up to the beating that I'm going to be giving it... If it lasts over a year before falling apart, I'll be impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Cody H.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for...
customer_reviews.text: For this class of punching bag, it's cheap. However, you get what you paid for. If you choose to use water (over sand) to fill the base, it will leak when you punch the bag decently. It's just poorly designed that way. I keep mine in the garage though, so the water leaking everywhere is manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Howard

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product is very good and easy to assemble. After a week of using i saw that the plastic that the bolts are bolted in makes it sort of uneven with one side from the other. but other then that its a good overall bag. The sand really does make a difference, I tried it with both and the water still moved the bag (like a small amount) but the sand made sure the bag was set in place even with powerful punches
customer_reviews.author: Luis Capili

customer_reviews.title: Had no instructions but great product so far
customer_reviews.text: It came with no instructions. Thank goodness for YouTube. A lot of reviews said it leaks with water so I opted for sand. Put about 250 lbs of sand in it and it still had some space. It definitely moves a bit when you hit it but not terribly. Great cardio workout and at 86 bucks with tax it was a great deal too.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: its not to bad of a punching bag..
customer_reviews.text: i would of gave it more stars but for one the bag does move or shift around some even with all the sand i put inside the base. i didnt want it to high up in fear the adjusting or connecting pole would eventually break off. better to set the bag as low as possible. no fun there but at least you can get a decent work out.
customer_reviews.author: blanche

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart on first use
customer_reviews.text: For something with the title “Power core” I did not expect for dried glue to falling out of it like snow on the first use, not to mention all the strings falling off and the interior falling apart as I was putting it together. And I had to retighten the bolts three times while using it. Nice firmness though. Not sure if I’m going to return it yet, but I definitely wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ten Broeck

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. We tried filling it with water until we could get to the store to buy sand. It def works better with sand but still moves a little if punching or kicking too hard. Other all, we are pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi G.

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: I owned an Everlast punching bag several years ago and loved it. The design has changed since then and this one does not want to stay together. Every time I punch on it the screws loose up on me. I followed the directions and did exactly as instructed. Looks like a flaw in the design. Unfortunately I cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Terry D. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: It was ok, before the mold
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok before the mold - I used sand ( left bit in the bag) but then realized There was an order, the sand was getting mold from being in side. I had to take the bags out and now I’m hesitating to use anything else for the fear it will creat mold.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: New, Used, or Newly Used?
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it was easy to put together. Only took me 20mins. I would’ve have this five stars but it was clearly used and then repackaged as if it was new. There was sand residue in the bottom I could see marks from the bolts used to put it together. It’s great for me I’m a 5’7 female athletic shape good for my at home workouts and to train my little one
customer_reviews.author: Long time amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: If you have any power it will fall apart fast...I used to have the older version of this for years. But these newer ones are just falling apart. Doesn't stay locked and foam is just falling apart. Very disappointed.. I feel like this is my worst purchase so far on Amazon.. Sadly won't be ordering anymore everlasting if this is the quality I'll receive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still worst the money.
customer_reviews.text: For the most part the bag is fine, the only issue is that if you’re using the bag everyday you will have to tighten the bolts that holds the bag every four to five days. And the bag on the post turns the a great deal when using.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mc

customer_reviews.title: Nice workout
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought this for myself. A couple of things I wasn't happy about was that it was missing some of the washers and wrench (allen) to help put it together. The other problem was the packaging when it arrived. The box could've been taped up better.
customer_reviews.author: LilMsT

customer_reviews.title: I’m going to town on it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Putting it together is easy but it takes a lot of time with the screwing in parts. It kind of slide around a bit depending on how hard I hit it but I don’t mind. I just pull it back to its spot periodically. It’s still sturdy enough for me. I strongly recommend using sand instead of water. It’s a big difference in sturdiness. Plus it won’t leak. The screws become lose after awhile so be sure to tighten them up once in a while. All in all, it’s a great product for what it’s worth. I burn a lot of energy on it. I’m pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage- DO NOT FILL WITH WATER
customer_reviews.text: So it leaks. Constantly. FIll it with Sand, not Water- do not listen to instructions. Hopefully sand will not leak, and I can only hope that the nearly double density of sand vs water means that it will be heavy enough *NOT* to slide all over the floor when I hit it. As of now, it's a totally useless, leaky freestanding mobile puddle.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lipschutz

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Fill your base with sand and not water. It’ll be less messy, and you’ll never have to worry about leaking or refilling. The only gripe o have about the bag is it’s tendency to slip down. I’m 6’1 so I setup the bag a bit higher. After about 5 minutes of hitting, the bag will begin to slide down, which is a bit annoying but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: PreppyL

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It came fast and perfectly fine in the box. Building was not hard since it comes with instructions and all. I love it cause you can throw punches at it and do side kick with no hassle. I did put only bags of cement (2) and that holds it fine. For me as a female lol cause I don’t hit as hard but I love it. Better than paying for kickboxing classes
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed
customer_reviews.text: This is good for home use. I know they state you can put water or sand it in. While that might work, I can see how the water might leak out of the top and the sand would likely do the same. I bought four 50 lb bags of concrete mix. It provides the weight without the potential of water or sand coming out. The large opening on this unit allows for you do do this while others don't give you that option. Result is good...it moves some but not much especially if you are circling the bag when using it. We like it!
customer_reviews.author: Marita Poll Images

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening my husband noticed this items looked previously VERY USED and as he went on their was no question! I was very disappointed as this was for a class that was starting on Monday. I'm taking a chance and reordering with the Hope's that one was accidentally put back in the rotation.
customer_reviews.author: paula washington

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Have had this over a year and have not been able to use it once. Not because I am lazy or do not have the time. No. Because upon assembly, we realized the holes do not line up to screw the stupid thing together. So, one year later I have a punching bag with only half the holes lined up and screwed together. Useless. I would have returned it if it wasnt such a hassle and I didnt have so much else going on. Till this day in still sick that I spent so much money on something not functional and taking up room.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Not very stable
customer_reviews.text: First the water spilled after the first try of using it, i changed to sand and the same happened... im 5'3 and weight 128 and when i used it is completely unstable and is not like i am that strong to be that unstable
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Rafael Lugo Morales

customer_reviews.title: Punchin Happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought to have some easy in home cardio for when weather stops me from running. Pretty happy with my purchase. Doesn't take up a lot of room, I putting some sort of mat down under it so the plastic bottom doesn't scratch your floor. I'm 5'5" & 120lbs, I filled it with sandbags so I could move it without having to drain the water. You can adjust the height of the bag but I think its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Beware the Screw holes don’t line up at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assemble doesn’t go together right a lot of the screw holes didn’t line up right. I don’t recommend it. Also water doesn’t keep it in place when u punch it a little bit it moves around.
customer_reviews.author: Jwq

customer_reviews.title: Probably good for kids
customer_reviews.text: As an adult male, when I punch it, fully filled with water - it moves ALL over the place, even on carpet, it wont stay still - im not that big = 165lbs, and im not a pro boxer, but when i punch it I have to put it up against a wall to not have it go all over.
customer_reviews.author: Bpage

customer_reviews.title: Just save your money and get bob
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because century Bob was too much and ended up spending more than I should have. The height adjuster notch broke on mine after a month so now it spins at the bottom when you punch it. Got Bob and it is much better.
customer_reviews.author: omar garza

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: The base comes apart after not much punching, resulting in a lot of sound as all the nails become loose and clang with every hit. The bag is also not very durable. It should be marketed as a "kids punching bag" because this bag won't last for any adult, male or female.
customer_reviews.author: Goliath

customer_reviews.title: Great..... but......
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but it was missing one bolt that would have finished it. I can use it but a little water splashes from the top of the base. I have spent to much money on my home gym to be missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Desmer Webb

customer_reviews.title: We recommend. Solid product.
customer_reviews.text: Just right for what we need, precise kicking with medium applied force for our Self Defense Classes. For heavy impact kicking, might want to get something sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Raphaela R.

customer_reviews.title: Suprised! Perfect for punching bag. Great deal
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. I dont think its for the mma fighters due to kicking it would probably tip. But he punches it and loves it. Hes a big guy and its sturdy for him.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Inner core foam padding falls apart
customer_reviews.text: It uses glued foams Donut type round foam circles as the inner core padding that are so cheaply glued together that u see the glued particles come apart n land on top of bottom base...absolutely the cheapest bag ever bought.. hopefully not hazardous materials
customer_reviews.author: ezy

customer_reviews.title: water did not work, leaking from top, put sand in, sand also came out from top
customer_reviews.text: water leaks, then put in sand, but sand also came out from the top, making it dusty, not a good product, at least should make it completely sealed from the top. moving is another issue, even put in 370 lb sand, it still moves. worst part is sand will come out from the top, even a little bit at a time, it will leak a lot after long time use.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Everlast takes a Punch
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my son so he could get in shape and help with his anger management. He loves it and I feel sorry for Everlast. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Valerie H

customer_reviews.title: Too Small for Adults
customer_reviews.text: This is so much smaller than we thought. However, we filled it with water and it became very solid. This product is only for kids. My husband and I have been using it and it is just too small for us. Also, my plan was to use it for kick boxing and it is not equipped to handle that either. My 14-year old loves it because it is just right for him. He is a smaller teenager though. So I gave it a score of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Do research
customer_reviews.text: First couple pieces easy to put together, but after that got harder and harder. Then direction say add water or fill with sand. Your best bet is to add both a fill all the way to the top. This is not meant honestly for adults as we have to much power. This is more suited for kids
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Leaks everywhere, buy a real heavy bag.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes but it sucks, it leaks every time you hit it. Even when you make sure to tighten everthing up it still lossens up and water comes out everywhere. Do not recommend unless you can figure out how to get it to not leak. But hey, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Roman V.

customer_reviews.title: Ok bag
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable height but it doesn’t want to stay there. As you hit the bag the base moves around. Not as big of a deal as the height not “locking” well.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best Free Standing Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag...This is my second free standing heavy bag and I wish I would have purchased this one first. This one is much easier to put sand or water in. I recommend putting sandbags in it....and just buy the sandbags and place them in the bottom that way if you need to move the bag you can take apart and lift the sandbags out. LOVE LOVE LOVE this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M Gardin

customer_reviews.title: Well Built Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Lots of sand or water to be added. You’ll need a dolly to move once filled. It also moves slightly when punched, so it can be moved around by punching. Great workout!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goid Product
customer_reviews.text: My son uses to exercise and get bad energy out. Working pretty well. He likes it and if filled to brim with sand, it is pretty sturdy. Well priced.
customer_reviews.author: DFL

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: A good bag, it took a little work to assemble because the screws and holes didn't quite match up but I got it together. It absolutely needs something to weigh it down
customer_reviews.author: PWNP

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Added sand vs water, still moves a bit but it's expected. Great for cardio workout.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy punching bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my little brother as a birthday gift. He loves it! It is actually very sturdy and works great! He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Torres

customer_reviews.title: You can not punch this as it is to short?
customer_reviews.text: If the product had more height and resilience it would be excellent1 I have it filled and set up but do not hit it as it is not steady enough and is ineffective for my height! I am 6'1". Can this be returned? I really have started this boxing program and already had a problem with a dummy I purchased as it tore the strap off the dummy first time? Sorry for this evaluation but the product does not meet the standards I thought it would?
customer_reviews.author: Ernest  M. Cross Charlie BrownX

customer_reviews.title: Love this punching bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this! No one thought at 62 I’d take up boxing! Great for a beginner
customer_reviews.author: Joy D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: I punch it and I feel good. The 300 pounds of sand don't weigh it down enough to keep it still so I occasionally have to re-adjust. Be sure to read the manual before trying to assemble it, I wasted 30-60 mins assembling and disassembling it only to reassemble it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for a good bag.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product on 02/06/2020 and it fell apart on 05/08/2020.... Bolts stripped on the head almost immediately during assemble. I chose to tighten it with a channel lock every time it loosened up after that. Poor product quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Woolbright

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money.
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this equipment daily. He loves it and it's been so worth the value of the equipment.
customer_reviews.author: mgclancy

customer_reviews.title: Holes don't line up
customer_reviews.text: If you can get past the fact that the holes don't line up... which I cannot, it isn't usable as a result, then it appears it could be a nice setup for the price. Unfortunately I am not able to make this work as delivered.
customer_reviews.author: AnAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok bag with very good price.
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good starter bag, but the height adjustment is easily knocked loose while working out, and a pain to try and lock back in with gloves on. I echo what others have said, fill this with sand or you will have water everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: No instructions. Seems ok
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be holding up well. Did not come with any assembly instructions so hoping it was put together ok.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Addicted Mom

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be better designed
customer_reviews.text: Moves when punching even when full of sand either on carpet or concrete. Foam top totally messy with grit/sand like particles constantly falling down from the zip area. Very poor quality and would never recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag to have for reflex
customer_reviews.text: playing the bag to develop faster rhythm and timing was awesome. Price was excellent. The only thing I dislike is unable to use the bag any longer because of how the screws are set into the plastic base is now stripped. I don't know if I would buy another one, but I would refer the bag once again to others. No power shots should be thrown on it. just use it like a shadow box mode.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Allen Blacks who wrote the bible

customer_reviews.title: Except to buy sand
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy unless your willing to by a crap ton of sand too. If you fill it with water it get everywhere and it doesn’t stay still while me a 5’7” 160 pound girl hits it unbelievable for the price really!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clock

customer_reviews.title: Love it and great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the money. Needs to be completely filled with water or sand so it doesn’t move when using it
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality we used water works fine for us but if you want more sturdiness deft use sand
customer_reviews.author: Yuri Arreguin

customer_reviews.title: Peace at last
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my wife and the kids beat on it instead of each other.
customer_reviews.author: Byron A. Patterson lll

customer_reviews.title: Total scam
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered on time, but when I opened it i realized it is missing many crucial parts for set up, including the screws, two inner pieces that complete the bag and allows it to be raised higher or lower. Also there is not an invoice with the details of this order so that I can return it. I am very dissatisfied, this was a $100 dollar purchase. I want to send this back as for it does not even have the right parts for complete set up!!
customer_reviews.author: Gwenhyfar

customer_reviews.title: Used not new!!!
customer_reviews.text: Clearly this was used because sand was all over my living room as soon as I took it out of the very ripped and taped up box. Looked like an animal got at it.
customer_reviews.author: LMang

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and great price
customer_reviews.text: Great! One of my Son’s Favorite Christmas presents and it gets him off Xbox! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Stacey B

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: bought this back in January and only gave it as a gift within the past week, only to find out that it shipped without the hardware needed to connect the top part to the bottom. Could be a small oversight and if corrected, id be willing to change my review as the overall quality of the product seems to be very good.
customer_reviews.author: Horustheprophet

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: 250 lbs of sand and still moved around floor.. even on mat.
customer_reviews.author: Stasia

customer_reviews.title: kids enjoy using it
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. It is helpful to have to help keep the kids active.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed because it was partly assembled before I got it, which would've been helpful if it was correct. The sleeve that goes over the styrofoam is extremely difficult to put on. It seems if I hit it with anything more than a tap it moves several inches.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just how I expected, good quality and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Hard to move
customer_reviews.text: It works good but make sure you have it where you want it to stay because I don’t know how I would be able to move it up or down stairs without it breaking
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: This product is VERY MUCH SO WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great buy! It came a little late from the seller but it was so worth it! I filled it up with sand for my fiancé and he LOVES boxing and kickboxing with this! We both pretty y’all so the adjustable height is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jaylen Williams-King

customer_reviews.title: stable
customer_reviews.text: it's awesome! perfect for home cardio. very easy to assemble and stable with water filling. moving a little bit while use pro style boxing gloves. overall great
customer_reviews.author: CY

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this gets out all those negative feeling while getting you in shape my kids love it too
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product did not hold up at all. The top part that you punch on just falls down to the lowest position when you start hitting it. My son is 6'-1" and was not able to use it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Smithwick

product_meta.title: Everlast Powercore Free Standing Indoor Home Rounded Heavy Duty Fitness Training Punching Bag
feature_bullets: Powere Core Training Bag for extensive workout
